trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_RODNEY_000_000<tab>Good news, adventurer! While you were away, Mistress Krile completed her work on the Aethernet relay, allowing us to access another region of the island!
TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_RODNEY_100_000<tab>I'm told it's quite different from Anemos─far, far colder, on account of a preponderance of ice-aspected aether. Accordingly, the team dubbed it “Pagos.”
TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_RODNEY_000_001<tab>They've already established a new base camp, and if you'd like to lend a hand with the expedition, you'd be more than welcome.
TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_RODNEY_000_002<tab>Just say the word and I'll see to the arrangements. I'm sure Mistress Krile will be overjoyed to see you again!
TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You now have access to the Forbidden Land, Eureka Pagos. Like Anemos, Pagos can be explored in parties of up to eight players, or solo.
TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>To embark on your journey to Pagos, speak with Rodney at Pier #1 in Kugane.

TEXT_STMBDY402_02942_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Please be advised that all excursions into the Forbidden Land, Eureka Pagos, are item level synced. Gear exceeding an item level of <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E80215 /var> will be adjusted.
